description:
Soccer coach's clipboard is the perfect app for you to demonstrate plays and strategies on. Use your fingers to move players and the ball around the field. Features half ice and full ice mode. Save unlimited number of plays that you can load quickly from the sidelines.

Features:
- Move players with fingers 
- Half and full field mode
- Save and load plays
- Draw lines with fingers
- Show/hide home and away team
- Change player number (double tap on player) 
- Change number of players
